description: Seems like a good idea for an app, but the Select Browser button doesn't work for me with Firefox and Chrome installed.
summary: Good idea but can't select target browser

description: Worked for me with Brave. Seamless and able to create icons. Integrates nicely.

Flatpak version 0.4.6
I am now able to paste urls without freezing, pngs can be used as icons, and app now uses system file picker. 5/5
Flatpak version 0.4.5
Currently app hangs when you paste something from clipboard, cant use png as app icons, by default app cant see filesystem when picking icon. Web apps are working well so 4/5 for now.
worked well for me but the firefox based webapps doesn't follow custom firefox css like libadwaita theme for firefox

App downloaded an icon theme pack without asking me.
Freezes when I paste a URL in to the URL field.
Flatpak doesn't get Home folder access, so can't add my own icon.
Forcing access then chosing an icon does nothing.

Needs some work.

great app, I was waiting for something like that since a long time. For now "only" 3 stars because it's still crashing sometimes but we can already see improvments with quick updates Please, could you add the "Proton Pass" icon :p thanks
